abstract.text: Usages for devices that manage a battery.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

abstract.text: Develop drivers for human-interface devices, such as keyboards, pointing devices, and digitizers like pens and touch pads.
Usages for devices that measure or track power, such as universal power supplies or chargers.
Identify the types of data that HID devices can report to your driver.
